data.quote: He who knows nothing is closer to the truth than he whose mind is filled with falsehoods and errors.
data.author: Thomas Jefferson

data.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
data.author: Charles F. Kettering

data.quote: It’s human nature to start taking things for granted again when danger isn’t banging loudly on the door.
data.author: David Hackworth

data.quote: You may not realize it when it happens, but a kick in the teeth may be the best thing in the world for you.
data.author: Walt Disney

data.quote: When you want to succeed as bad as you want to breathe, then you’ll be successful.
data.author: Eric Thomas

data.quote: It's not the load that breaks you down, it's the way you carry it.
data.author: Lou Holtz

data.quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
data.author: Viktor E. Frankl

data.quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the bullshit story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
data.author: Jordan Belfort

data.quote: You never change your life until you step out of your comfort zone; change begins at the end of your comfort zone.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Do what is right, not what is easy nor what is popular.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: Turn your obstacles into opportunities and your problems into possibilities.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett

data.quote: If you have a dream, don’t just sit there. Gather courage to believe that you can succeed and leave no stone unturned to make it a reality.
data.author: Dr Roopleen
